headline: A ‘Crippling’ Winter Storm is Coming. Utilities Are at Risk.
summary: For utilities and power plant owners, storms of this magnitude can lead to large financial losses, Jefferies analyst Julien Dumoulin-Smith says. Data centers are making the power crunch even more acute.

raw.headline: A ‘Crippling’ Winter Storm is Coming. Utilities Are at Risk.
raw.summary: For utilities and power plant owners, storms of this magnitude can lead to large financial losses, Jefferies analyst Julien Dumoulin-Smith says. Data centers are making the power crunch even more acute.

headline: NUKZ ETF Surges 58% as Nuclear Power Bets Face Trump Policy and Concentration Tests
summary: The Range Nuclear Renaissance Index ETF has gained 58% over the past year, riding enthusiasm for nuclear power that’s built since Microsoft and Amazon announced plans to power data centers with small modular reactors. With $725 million in assets under management and a portfolio spanning uranium miners, reactor manufacturers, and utility operators, NUKZ has become ... NUKZ ETF Surges 58% as Nuclear Power Bets Face Trump Policy and Concentration Tests

headline: What You Need to Know Ahead of Vistra’s Earnings Release
summary: Vistra is preparing to unveil its fourth-quarter earnings in the near term, and analysts are projecting a triple-digit jump in the company’s bottom-line results.

headline: Oklo: Meta Partnership Excites Investors, But Doesn't Fix The Fundamentals
summary: Oklo is a pre-commercial nuclear reactor developer with a high-profile Meta Platforms partnership but remains unprofitable and highly speculative. Click here to know more.

headline: Jim Cramer on Constellation Energy: “The Fact Is That When the President Gets Involved, It’s Too Uncertain”
summary: Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. A caller mentioned that they got out of the stock as it started to decline after President Trump’s comments regarding an electricity rate cap. In response, Cramer said: You know, it’s funny, I was… going to tell you it’s Constellation or […]
